channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PA

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 40 pound bag of Gard Acid P84 (un1759) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 200 grams of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023090645
item.description:
Report X-2023090645

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: LEWISBERRY
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: shipment taken out of system flow due to external carton wet and leaking package found in trailer # 829429 damaged already wet and leaking upon inspection of inner contents 4x5 liters plastic bottles of medivators rapicide pa parts A & B 1x5 litler plastic bottle of medivators rapicide pa part B had loose cap allowing 1 liter to release from bottle package did have slotted partitions and a inner box no bags or absorbent was found facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed contents contained and awaiting disposition DescribePack: one 5 liter plastic bottle of medivators rapicide pa parts B had loose cap allowing 1 litler to release from bottle DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: leaking package was placed in a hazmat bag lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023090640
item.description:
Report X-2023090640

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: LEWISBERRY
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090640 SequenceEvent: Shipment was taken out of system flow due to external carton wet. Upon inspecting the inner contents there were 2 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of Zep Concentrated Industrial Purple Degreaser. The 1 x 1 gallon plastic bottle had a loose cap allowing .10 gallons to release. No packing or absorbent was found in box. Facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed, contents contained and awaiting disposition. DescribePack: The 1 x 1 gallon plastic bottle of Zep Concentrated Industrial Purple Degreaser had a loose cap allowing .10 gallons to release. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a lined red tote to contain the leaking hazmat, then was taken to the hazmat cage for further inspection. 2. X-2023090644 SequenceEvent: shipment taken out of system due to 5-gal plastic pail /drum wet and leaking package came off trailer number # 957348 already damaged wet leaking inspection of contents 1 x 5-gallon plastic pail / drum of zep industrial purple degreaser had loose cap allowing all 5 gallons to be released from container. facility procedures for damaged hazardous material followed contents contained and awaiting disposition. DescribePack: 1 5 gallon plastic pail / drum had loose cap allowing all 5 gallons to release. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: leaking pail / drum was placed in a hazmat bag lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023090601
item.description:
Report X-2023090601

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipment taken out of system flow due to external carton wet. Package came off of trailer#458197 already leaking/damaged. Upon inspection of inner contents 4 X 1 gallon plastic bottles Nu-Brite condenser coil cleaner. 1 X 1 gallon plastic bottle of condenser coil cleaner had a loose cap allowing .20 gallons to release. The other 3 X 1 gallon plastic bottles of condenser coil cleaner were not damaged. There was slotted partitions but no absorbent found. Facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed. Contents contained and awaiting disposition. DescribePack: 1 out of 4 plastic bottles of condenser coil cleaner had a loose cap leaking out .20 gallons of liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a hazmat bag lined red tote.
